data.text: @Piyush27Chavan Hi Piyush, we hear you and apologise for the delay that you've experienced. We work hard to run an on-time airline; however, unforeseen events sometimes challenge us. Sorry, this happened with your flight. In the future, we'll try harder to meet your expectations.

@manojmarketing Hi Jinendra, we are extremely sorry for the experience you had. It is never our intention to make our guests feel unhappy with our service. We have shared your feedback with the concerned team for review, and they'll surely look into this.
@abhishek_tilak Hi Abhishek, we would like to inform you that your refund has been processed from our end. We request you to get in touch with your travel agent for further assistance.

urls.title: Flight Tracker - Check Live Flight Status with Go First
urls.description: Get real time updates on arrival and departure of your Go First flights. Track flights by flight number or flight routes. Click here for more information.
